english.segment1: I took this picture in the dark. Spinning in lights till we fell apart. So turn it away, turn it away. You don't know what I've seen. The youth is hollow and so are we. They give it away, give it away
english.segment2: This is what it feels like. This is disintegration. This is what it feels like. This is isolation
english.segment3: I can't find the light. Inside this empty room I cannot find myself. I won't let you down
english.segment4: I hold on by a single thread. Sweet solitude is so complete in my head. You watch me dangle there and become just a memory. Like they said I would end up
english.segment5: The youth is marching to tear us down. We built our lives here. We fight their calling
english.segment6: Take sides. Line up and take sides
english.segment7: I'm so sick of you calling the shots. (I'll tear you down from the inside)
english.segment8: I can't find the light. Inside this empty room I seem to loose myself. I won't let you down
english.segment9: So write this down I'm not using my lungs anymore. This is the last time. Write it down, I won't be your voice anymore.
